explains: n. 收获；收获量，捕获量；成果，收获
v. 收割，收获；采集，搜集；收采（人的器官、细胞等）
wordGroup: good harvest 丰收；好收成；高产
harvest time 收获季节；收割期
harvest moon 秋分前后的满月
harvest festival 收获节（由基督教教会所举行）

sentences.en: The poor harvest caused prices to rise sharply.
sentences.cn: 收成不好导致物价急剧上涨。

sentences.en: The vegetable harvest is disastrously behind schedule.
sentences.cn: 蔬菜收割灾难性地滞后于计划。

sentences.en: Rice farmers here still plant and harvest their crops by hand.
sentences.cn: 这里的稻农仍然用手工种植和收割庄稼。
